00006       {
00007             if( !LMInstance ) {
00008                   LMInstance = new LogManager( );

00010                   HLOGMSG( "Initialized Logger" );
00011             }

00030       void InitRenderer( RendererType::RendererType rtype, HWND hwnd, int width, int height, bool fullscreen )
00031       {
00032             if( !RSInstance ) {
00033                   if( rtype == RendererType::DX9 )
00034                         RSInstance = new DX9RenderSystem( );
00035                   else if( rtype == RendererType::OpenGL )
00036                         RSInstance = new DX9RenderSystem( );
00037                   RSInstance->Init( hwnd, width, height, fullscreen );
00038                   HLOGMSG( "Initialized Renderer System [RSType:%d,WIDTH:%d,HEIGHT:%d]", rtype, width, height );
00039             }
00040             if( !IMInstance ) {
00041                   IMInstance = new InputManager( );
00042                   IMInstance->Init( hwnd, width, height );
00043                   HLOGMSG( "Initialized Input Manager" );
00044             }
00045       };
00046 
00047       void Destroy( )
00048       {
00049             if( IMInstance ) {
00050                   delete IMInstance;
00051                   IMInstance = 0;
00052             }
00053             if( RSInstance ) {
00054                   delete RSInstance;
00055                   RSInstance = 0;
00056             }
00057             if( RMInstance ) {
00058                   delete RMInstance;
00059                   RMInstance = 0;
00060             }
00061             if( FSMInstance ) {
00062                   delete FSMInstance;
00063                   FSMInstance = 0;
00064             }
00065             if( LMInstance ) {
00066                   delete LMInstance;
00067                   LMInstance = 0;
00068             }
00069       };
